post.author: 권칠환
post.content:
Announcing the Code Jam Session for Toronto Android Users Group!

What: Code Jam Session

When: Saturday, August 28, 2010 2:00 PM

Where: Yorkville Media Centre
46 Hayden Street 4th Floor
Toronto, ON M4Y 1V8

We'll be doing our first Code Jam session this coming Saturday. We'll be working on putting together a small "Toronto Android Users Group" application during the session. Please bring your laptop, and make sure Eclipse, the Android plugin, and the latest SDK (2.2) are installed. I would also suggest completing the tutorial at http://developer.android.com/resources/index.html before the session. You'll also need to know Java.

The session will be approximately 3 hours.

Since we've never done a code jam session before, we'll be capping attendance to 12 people this time. Will definitely open up the session to more people in the future.

Please RSVP. Thanks!

RSVP to this Meetup:
http://www.torontoandroid.org/calendar/14508347/
post.title: Android Code Jam session in Toronto
